cmdGA.parameterType

Class FontParameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmdGA.parameterType.ParameterType
      • cmdGA.parameterType.FontParameter

  • public class FontParameter
extends ParameterType
    This Class represents a Font parameter in a command line.
    Author:
    Javier Iserte

    • Method Detail

      • getParameter

        public static FontParameter getParameter()
        No instance variables are used, so there is no need of more than one instance. A 'singleton' pattern is implemented.
        Returns:
        the only one instance FontParameter

      • parse

        protected java.lang.Object parse(java.lang.String parameter)
        Parse method.
        Accepts: "[fontname, fontstyle, size]" or "[fontname, fontstyle]" or "[fontname]".
        Example: parse("[arial,0,10]").
        The fontstyle is an integer from 0 to 3:
        0 is for Plain Text.
        1 is for Bold Text.
        2 is for Italic Text.
        3 if for Bold+Italics Text.
        Specified by:
        parse in class ParameterType
        Returns:
        A Font or null
